…Maryland for both a bachelor's degree  in Political Science and a Juris Doctorate degree, Molly began her  career on Capitol Hill as a Legislative Assistant for Rep. Andy Harris  (MD-01) in 2019, before becoming Senior Advisor on Health Policy and  later Legislative Director for Rep. Richard Hudson  (NC-09) in 2021. In  January 2023, Molly became Counsel…

…should say representing; we don't govern, but do our job.

I am blessed to be alive. I am a cancer survivor. I have talked about  that before. I was blessed to have treatment at MD Anderson, and that  was 14 years ago. I think it was 14 years ago this next month.

Why do I bring that up? I bring that up because I get cancer groups  that come into my office…

…Graves      Gray      Green (TN)      Greene (GA)      Griffith      Grothman      Guest      Guthrie      Hageman      Hamadeh (AZ)      Haridopolos      Harrigan      Harris (MD)      Harris (NC)      Harshbarger      Hern (OK)      Higgins (LA)      Hill (AR)      Hinson      Houchin      Hudson      Huizenga      Hurd (CO)      Issa      Jack…

…she was meant to  be there. She wanted her presence and her voice to help shape our  policies and change our world for the better.

We got her into a joint clinical trial at MD Anderson and Texas  Children's Hospital, but, unfortunately, it was too late. She had to be  put on a ventilator 3 weeks after our summit, and she passed away.

As Congresswoman…

…Gundu, Nathan Kim, Anika Nagle, Anoushka Nagle, Lukeman       Nouri, Amarachi Okwor, Lindsey Pagett (Huffman), Arhan       Shrivastava, Hayim Sims, Tiffany Strachan, Hannah Sui

…handful of doctors they can go to, what lousy deductible they get, what  ridiculous copay they have.

I have a constituent who died from cancer last year who couldn't go  to MD Anderson because she was covered under ObamaCare. Think about  that, covered under ObamaCare, sick with cancer, can't go to the best  cancer hospital in the world 2 hours from…

…Gosar      Graves      Green (TN)      Greene (GA)      Griffith      Grothman      Guest      Guthrie      Hageman      Hamadeh (AZ)      Haridopolos      Harrigan      Harris (MD)      Harris (NC)      Harshbarger      Hern (OK)      Higgins (LA)      Hill (AR)      Hinson      Houchin      Hudson      Huizenga      Hunt      Hurd (CO)      Issa…

…cancer.

As a cancer survivor, I have seen firsthand the horrors of the  disease. I told my Committee on Rules colleagues last night in  committee, in my time in treatment at MD Anderson, going through chemo  seemed trivial to me compared to watching the parents at MD Anderson  who were watching their children go through treatment.

Molly went to Heaven…
